title: Spaghetti Bolognese
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich, savory meat sauce.
instructions: 1. Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente. 2. In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until fragrant. 3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 4. Stir in tomato sauce, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 15 minutes. 5. Serve the sauce over spaghetti and top with Parmesan cheese if desired.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A spicy and flavorful Indian-inspired chicken curry.
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until fragrant. 2. Add chicken and cook until browned. 3. Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute. 4. Add tomatoes and coconut milk, then simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables.
instructions: 1. Heat sesame oil in a wok or large skillet. 2. Add garlic and ginger and sauté for 30 seconds. 3. Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp. 4. Drizzle with soy sauce and toss to combine. 5. Garnish with sesame seeds before serving.
